name: Dr. Mundo
title: the Madman of Zaun
shortBio: Utterly mad, tragically homicidal, and horrifyingly purple, Dr. Mundo is what keeps many of Zaun's citizens indoors on particularly dark nights. Now a self-proclaimed physician, he was once a patient of Zaun's most infamous asylum. After "curing" the entire staff, Dr. Mundo established his practice in the empty wards that once treated him and began mimicking the highly unethical procedures he had so often experienced himself. With a full cabinet of medicines and zero medical knowledge, he now makes himself more monstrous with each injection and terrifies the hapless "patients" who wander near his office.

skins.name: Toxic Dr. Mundo
skins.description: Mundo not toxic, Mundo has healthy emotional coping mechanisms—oh, you mean purple goo? Mundo is sure that's fine, too.

skins.name: Mr. Mundoverse
skins.description: Mundo didn't mean to become fitness influencer, but Mundo's gains speak for themselves. Mundo recommends never skipping leg day, eating lots of protein, and smashing that like and subscribe button for more Mr. Mundoverse content.

skins.name: Corporate Mundo

chromas.name: Corporate Mundo (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Mundo is not financial advisor. This is not financial advice. But you should buy the skin. Mundo likes the skin.

skins.name: Mundo Mundo
skins.description: Mundo could have dressed as anyone to go trick-or-treating, but this year he went as Mundo. Every year he goes as Mundo. Mundo trick-or-treats as he pleases.

skins.name: Executioner Mundo
skins.description: Executioner Mundo thinks people should not be so scared of him. Executioner Mundo puts on pants and chops up prisoners one leg at a time, just like Mundo pleases.

skins.name: Rageborn Mundo
skins.description: There are many tales of the Rageborn menace: that he's slain dragons with a single cleave, that the mightiest wizards cannot halt his advances, that no noble knight foolish enough to try and stop him has ever come back alive. The accounts often contradict each other, but the one thing they all agree on is this: Where Mundo goes, no one else pleases.

skins.name: TPA Mundo
skins.description: Honoring Lilballz's winning performance as Mundo during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Pool Party Mundo
skins.description: Pool Party Mundo enjoys his hat and ukulele, but what he really loves are his shorts. They're comfy, and easy to wear.

skins.name: El Macho Mundo
skins.description: Probably in a position he'd rather not be in, El Macho will be facing down three of the greatest fighters in modern history for Sunday's no-holds-barred money match. Luckily for him, Mundo has more madness to offer than the federation thinks he's got, and the cream always rises to the top.

skins.name: Frozen Prince Mundo

chromas.name: Frozen Prince Mundo (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2018.

skins.description: Once a handsome prince from an outlying region of the Winterlands, Mundo was touched by the curse of Ice King Twitch—corrupting him into a brutish thrall. He's still convinced he's the same statuesque royal as before, and as such… goes where he pleases.

skins.name: Street Demons Dr. Mundo

chromas.name: Street Demons Dr. Mundo (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: An abstract genius of the highest caliber with a doctorate in fine art, Mundo's reckless and wild finger painting has earned him a lot of respect in the artistic community for its high-concept analysis of the monster/human condition. (Mundo isn't sure what that means; he's just happy that people like his work!)

passive.name: Goes Where He Pleases
passive.description:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

spells.name: Infected Bonesaw
spells.description: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Dr. Mundo hurls his bonesaw, dealing @CurrentHealthDamage*100@% current Health magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

If the bonesaw hits a champion or monster, Dr. Mundo restores @HealthRestoreOnHitChampionMonster@ Health. If it hits a non-champion or non-monster, Dr. Mundo instead restores @HealthRestoreOnHitMinion@ Health.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Heart Zapper
spells.description: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrilator, dealing @DamagePerTick*4@ magic damage each second for up to @Duration@ seconds to nearby enemies. Additionally he stores @GrayHealthStorageInitial@ of damage taken for the first @GrayHealthInitialDuration@ seconds and @GrayHealthStorage*100@% for the remaining duration as gray health and can Recast.

Recast: Detonate the defibrilator, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits at least one champion, Dr. Mundo restores @GrayHealthBigMod*100@% of gray health, otherwise he instead restores @GrayHealthSmallMod*100@% of gray health.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Blunt Force Trauma
spells.description:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his “medical” bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Passive: Dr Mundo gains @PassiveBonusAD@ Attack Damage.

Active: Dr Mundo violently swings his "medical" bag, causing his next Attack to deal an additional @AdditionalDamage@ physical damage, increased by up to @MaxDamageAmpTooltip@ based on his missing Health. If the enemy is killed, Mundo swats them away, dealing @AdditionalDamage@ physical damage to enemies they pass through.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Maximum Dosage
spells.description: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, gaining @MissingHealthHeal*100@% of his missing Health as max Health, @SpeedBoostAmount*100@% Move Speed, and regenerating @MaxHealthHoT*100@% max Health over @Duration@ seconds.

At Rank 3, both healing effects are increased by an additional @BonusPerNearbyChampion*100@% per nearby enemy champion.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
